M

main(String[]) - Static method in class piccross.Game
The main method that instantiates the object of GameView and runs the whole game.
main(String[]) - Static method in class piccross.GameClient
the static main method of the whole class where the whole functionality is executed for the client
main() - Method in class piccross.GameClient
the main method where the client will play with all the buttons of the UI
main(String[]) - Static method in class piccross.GameServer
main method of the server part which will execute the server
main() - Method in class piccross.GameServer
main method which is not static which has all the functionality of the client On clicking teh execute button - -the server will be launched and clients wiill be connected Connection of each client will generate a new thread
mainPanel() - Method in class piccross.GameController
This method is of return tyoe void creates the frame by collecting all the other panels It uses the grig bag layout to assemble the 5 panels.
markPanel() - Method in class piccross.GameController
This has the main checkbox that starts the game.
menu() - Method in class piccross.GameController
The menu of the piccross game which has two menu items and which prints the new game, provides the solution of the game and which allows the user to change the colors and thereby it also prints the information about the game in teh about dialog box.
menuCanceled(MenuEvent) - Method in class piccross.GameController
When the menu is cancelled
menuCanceled(MenuEvent) - Method in class piccross.GameView
 
menuDeselected(MenuEvent) - Method in class piccross.GameController
The function when the menu is deselected
menuDeselected(MenuEvent) - Method in class piccross.GameView

auto -generated methods by implementing the interface
menuSelected(MenuEvent) - Method in class piccross.GameView
